postMessage: Took amazing photograph during vacation, wanted to share!
Playing video games made me want to go on a tropical vacation. Where could I go that looks tropical like this?
Can anyone help me refactor JS code for WAD last homework, my project feels like a mess :S. Please send me a message!

Visited my good friend at bay area, Marcus, the lighthouse keeper. Drank few beers under clear night sky. Never seen Milky Way before like this. Took a picture on hike home, night was as bright as day. Enjoy!
New school year started, so any advice on coding that gets me through a year?
